=================================
Change log for gocept.pytestlayer
=================================

2.0 (2013-09-19)
================

- Remove need to explicitely create fixtures.
  [gotcha]

- Add ``plone.testing.layered`` test suites support.
  [gotcha]

- Made tests a bit more robust.
  [icemac]


1.0 (2013-08-28)
================

- Initial release.
  [tlotze, icemac, gotcha]
